action_title: Relocate bats from reclaimed mines to alternative subterranean roost sites
key_messages:
Key Messages:

We found no studies that evaluated the effects of relocating bats from reclaimed mines to alternative subterranean roost sites on bat populations.

‘We found no studies’ means that we have not yet found any studies that have directly evaluated this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
It may be possible to relocate bats roosting in reclaimed mines to nearby alternative subterranean roosts, if conditions are suitable.
